wrapper.linearExpr

Interface LinearExpr

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LinearIntExpr, LinearNumExpr

    public interface LinearExpr
    LinearNumExpr and LinearIntExpr wrapper used to hide MIPS or LP dedicated call.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTerm(ilog.concert.IloAddable addable)
      Add a term to the linear expression.
      void addTerm(int coef, ilog.concert.IloAddable addable)
      Add a term to the linear expression with a coefficient.
      ilog.concert.IloNumExpr expr() 

    • Method Detail

      • addTerm

        void addTerm(ilog.concert.IloAddable addable)
        Add a term to the linear expression. Null value will be safely ignore.
        Parameters:
        addable - term

      • addTerm

        void addTerm(int coef,
             ilog.concert.IloAddable addable)
        Add a term to the linear expression with a coefficient. Null value will be safely ignore.
        Parameters:
        coef - coefficient
        addable - term

      • expr

        ilog.concert.IloNumExpr expr()
        Returns:
        The underlying class object representation that as been encapsulated in this LinearExpr class.
